author: cms-sw
body:
New cms-git-tools contains following updates:
  - https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-git-tools/pull/79 : New git-cms-checkout-topic tool 
  - https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-git-tools/pull/81 : use cms-addpkg in cms-checkdeps
  - https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-git-tools/pull/82: Avoid AFS dependency by using /cvmfs/cms-ib.cern.ch/git/cms-sw/cmssw.git or /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/cmssw.git.daily as GIT_REFERENCE
title: updated cms-git-tools to 200bec0b9ae3d6d324605c07e3dd580b9e553273 on 170509
